name: To Here Knows When: Cycle 1
description:
To Here Knows When is about the failures of those in power and the folly of those who are not.

It's a first-person dialogue-focused game with several distinct story paths and endings. 

This is the first chapter of the game. There will be around 15 chapters in the final game.

This will take around 20 minutes to complete if you rush. There are secrets and optional quests.
